game.title: The Mysterious Legacy
game.objective: Cover the clues and find the treasure
game.description: A daring quest to unravel the mystery of a long-lost artifact. Embark on an adventure where ancient prophecies, enigmatic riddles, and treacherous obstacles await you. Will you be the one to claim the treasure's secrets?

task.objective: Find the Cipher in the Lighthouse
task.description: Discover the first clue by deciphering an old letter within the lighthouse's archives. The clue points to a hidden island.

task.objective: Solve the Riddle of the Moonlight Tree
task.description: The riddle is about a tree near the beach, where moonlight illuminates its roots. Uncover the next clue at that location.
task.location: Glowing Moonlight Grove by the Sea

task.objective: Battle the Guardian of the Temple
task.description: Confront the guardian, a skilled warrior with an ancient artifact. Success depends on your strategy and agility.
